original_text: With pestilence and bloodshed I will enter into judgment with him, and I will rain upon him and his hordes and the many peoples who are with him torrential rains and hailstones, fire and sulfur.
korean_text: 내가 또 전염병과 피로 그를 심판하며 쏟아지는 폭우와 큰 우박덩이와 불과 유황으로 그와 그 모든 무리와 그와 함께 있는 많은 백성에게 비를 내리듯 하리라

sentences.original_text: With pestilence and bloodshed I will enter into judgment with him
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 역병과 피흘림으로 그와 심판에 들어가리라

sentences.original_text: and I will rain upon him
and the many peoples who are with him
